lore: During the new moon phase, the Elves usually climb into the treetops to gaze at the velvety night sky, speckled with countless stars. There, Elf Mystics sing ancient songs in a solemn voice about, among other similar things, the rustling of leaves when they are swayed by the wind. Besides appeasing the soul of their people, they can channel the energy of the forest into their scepters and use it to blow up their enemies.
menagerieDialog: The sound of elves singing at night is a spectacle worth witnessing.
No one shall trespass through our lands without consequences.
Elves fight best in the thick of a dense forest. Perhaps you should adjust our strategy accordingly.
Everyone tends to underestimate the Elves. We have proved that to be a mistake time and time again.
(It's cracking its knuckles nervously. You find it strange that it adopted a habit that is generally associated with humans.)
name: Elf Mystic
